comment.description:
Creates a `duckdb_logical_type` from a standard primitive type.
The resulting type should be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

This should not be used with `DUCKDB_TYPE_DECIMAL`.
comment.return_value: The logical type.

comment.description:
Returns the alias of a duckdb_logical_type, if one is set, else `NULL`.
The result must be destroyed with `duckdb_free`.

param_comments.type: The logical type to return the alias of

comment.return_value: The alias or `NULL`

comment.description:
Creates a list type from its child type.
The resulting type should be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

param_comments.type: The child type of list type to create.

comment.return_value: The logical type.

comment.description:
Creates an array type from its child type.
The resulting type should be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

param_comments.type: The child type of array type to create.
param_comments.array_size: The number of elements in the array.

comment.return_value: The logical type.

comment.description:
Creates a map type from its key type and value type.
The resulting type should be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

param_comments.key_type: The key type of map type to create.
param_comments.value_type: The value type of map type to create.

comment.return_value: The logical type.

comment.description:
Creates a UNION type from the passed types array.
The resulting type should be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

param_comments.member_types: The array of types that the union should consist of.
param_comments.member_count: The size of the types array.

comment.return_value: The logical type.

comment.description:
Creates a STRUCT type from the passed member name and type arrays.
The resulting type should be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

param_comments.member_types: The array of types that the struct should consist of.
param_comments.member_names: The array of names that the struct should consist of.
param_comments.member_count: The number of members that were specified for both arrays.

comment.return_value: The logical type.

comment.description:
Creates an ENUM type from the passed member name array.
The resulting type should be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

param_comments.member_names: The array of names that the enum should consist of.
param_comments.member_count: The number of elements that were specified in the array.

comment.return_value: The logical type.

comment.description:
Creates a `duckdb_logical_type` of type decimal with the specified width and scale.
The resulting type should be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

param_comments.width: The width of the decimal type
param_comments.scale: The scale of the decimal type

comment.return_value: The logical type.

comment.description: Retrieves the enum type class of a `duckdb_logical_type`.
comment.return_value: The type id

comment.description: Retrieves the width of a decimal type.
comment.return_value: The width of the decimal type

comment.description: Retrieves the scale of a decimal type.
comment.return_value: The scale of the decimal type

comment.description: Retrieves the internal storage type of a decimal type.
comment.return_value: The internal type of the decimal type

comment.description: Retrieves the internal storage type of an enum type.
comment.return_value: The internal type of the enum type

comment.description: Retrieves the dictionary size of the enum type.
comment.return_value: The dictionary size of the enum type

comment.description:
Retrieves the dictionary value at the specified position from the enum.

The result must be freed with `duckdb_free`.
comment.return_value: The string value of the enum type. Must be freed with `duckdb_free`.

comment.description:
Retrieves the child type of the given list type.

The result must be freed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.
comment.return_value: The child type of the list type. Must be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

comment.description:
Retrieves the child type of the given array type.

The result must be freed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.
comment.return_value: The child type of the array type. Must be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

comment.description: Retrieves the array size of the given array type.
comment.return_value: The fixed number of elements the values of this array type can store.

comment.description:
Retrieves the key type of the given map type.

The result must be freed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.
comment.return_value: The key type of the map type. Must be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

comment.description:
Retrieves the value type of the given map type.

The result must be freed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.
comment.return_value: The value type of the map type. Must be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

comment.description: Returns the number of children of a struct type.
comment.return_value: The number of children of a struct type.

comment.description:
Retrieves the name of the struct child.

The result must be freed with `duckdb_free`.
comment.return_value: The name of the struct type. Must be freed with `duckdb_free`.

comment.description:
Retrieves the child type of the given struct type at the specified index.

The result must be freed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.
comment.return_value: The child type of the struct type. Must be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

comment.description: Returns the number of members that the union type has.
comment.return_value: The number of members of a union type.

comment.description:
Retrieves the name of the union member.

The result must be freed with `duckdb_free`.
comment.return_value: The name of the union member. Must be freed with `duckdb_free`.

comment.description:
Retrieves the child type of the given union member at the specified index.

The result must be freed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.
comment.return_value: The child type of the union member. Must be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

comment.description: Destroys the logical type and de-allocates all memory allocated for that type.
